column4: i am on a live cd tring to mount sda2 does anybody know how to do this here is the output when i run "sudo fdisk -l" http://pastie.org/1527318
does it not show in the places menu?
it does show  in the places menu but wont munt i get an error
when i click on it after 30min or so it says it was not able to mount
ok then mount it at command line, make a folder in /media and mount the partition there, you should get more detailed output
do u know the command for mounting?
the mount is taking a while, is it suppoed to do that?
is this an NTFS partition you are mounting?
ok, which partition are you mounting?
ok I suggest you fsck it to make sure it's healthy
what is the command for fsck?
when i run sudo file -sL /dev/sda2 i got http://pastie.org/1527405 do u think its possible to recover the drive?
ok then websearch for the journal recovery bit, see how its fixed
